website_summaries.verdict: A distinctive, durable ball that won't get confused with others at the gym or park.
pros: Crossover styling helps you change pace and direction
For indoor or outdoor play.Optima rubber cover with 16 panel construction
Pebbled channels for increased grip and control
Pressure lock bladder maintains ball pressure
cons: Different sizes are different colors, so check carefully before ordering

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: This ball turned my eight year old into a legit college prospect. Just kidding. It's a ball and it bounces. I'm not giving it five stars because the first ball we received went into the garage and came out with a puncture on one of the seams (we don't store machetes in our garage, but not sure what it hit). Regardless, it is obviuosly not super-quality but at this price I feel it deserves four stars. A replacement ball was sent expeditiously. We just had to go to the trouble of repacking the deflated ball and taking it to the UPS store.
customer_reviews.author: NomadicTrader

customer_reviews.title: Have to inflate daily to use
customer_reviews.text: The ball came in a large box. My husband asked if it was inflated and I said yes. But when he checked, it needed more air. We thought it had just shipped that way on purpose. But, every day, the ball needs air to bounce. Every day we need to pump air. We gave up on this ball and started using a large bouncy ball from a discount store. That ball has never needed air. Wish I had returned the basketball but I kept forgetting to and I think I missed the deadline now. The ball sits unused in our garsge now. No one wants to inflate it anymore.
customer_reviews.author: SonshineMom

customer_reviews.title: Not NBA quality, but adequate for streetball
customer_reviews.text: Play like Lebron's cousin's uncle's nephew. If Lebron's cousin's uncle bought a ball for his nephew for an outdoor court, this would be the ball. It's round, bounces, goes through the hoop, and maintain's air pressure. For the money, can't be beat.
customer_reviews.author: Brent T Henning

customer_reviews.title: great value, holds air , takes all an eight y.o. can deliver
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for an eight year old super active that has caught the basketball bug. She loves the color and uses the ball here (no blacktop just compacted road base - gravel) and at school. I found that it is durable and a great value. It has been in near constant use these last three months and is still has not needed air. She uses it as a seat too. Get this one.
customer_reviews.author: Loves to troubleshoot

customer_reviews.title: I love this ball so much
customer_reviews.text: I love this ball so much. It’s to hold, it dribbles nicely, and most importantly it doesn’t deflate over night, which is a common problem I saw in a lot of reviews for other balls. So you don’t have to worry about that when buying it. It’s an outdoor ball so you can use it both outdoors and indoors. It won’t pop or anything if you dribble it outside. Another thing is that it’s a 29.5” .ball My favorite part about it is how it looks when spinning in the air because of its color scheme. It’s an overall amazing product.
customer_reviews.author: Babatee

customer_reviews.title: Best in Class
customer_reviews.text: For price and quality the KCs cant be beat. We have the blue and orange one and they are our go to balls for playground or street balling. If a couple of random kids come over to my kids and want to challenge them to a game of 21, we have to choose a ball and this is the ball that is most often selected for the all important showdowns. No, i don't mean to compare this to a Wilson Evo or Baden Elite in giving it 5 stars. However, in its class, and for the price, these balls are simply the best.
customer_reviews.author: TidesManian Devil

customer_reviews.title: Defective product!!!!
customer_reviews.text: So upset!!! Got this as a Christmas gift and it won’t hold air! It’s a great color and feel but cis causing nothing but frustration from my 10 year old and my husband. We should t have to refill every 30 minutes!!!!
customer_reviews.author: PDudish

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this ball for my sons. They’ve been using it for 3 days now and I have to pump this ball about 4 times a day. What’s the point in having a basketball if you have to pump it up over and over again. Keep your money or buy another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri

customer_reviews.title: Gripping
customer_reviews.text: The grip on this ball is outstanding, and perfect for the young turks to show off their hand strength (see pic). We bought our three teens a ball each: red/white for my daughter,for my son, and thefor my youngest. It’s a colorful show when they are shooting hoops on our portablehoop, or at the local courts. The price makes this a perfect seasonal ball with no worries as to longevity. The Wilson Killer Crossover has a great look and is a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie GilbertTop Contributor: Jigsaw Puzzles

customer_reviews.title: The ball developed an unrepairable leak after a week. ...
customer_reviews.text: The ball developed an unrepairable leak after a week. I had bought one before this one a while back and it developed 5 small holes in it in very little time. I have bought the last one from this vendor!
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great ball for my 7 year old
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had for more than a day but right out of the box it is a great ball for my 7 year old who just wants to have fun at the hoop in our cul de sac. Great grip, quite bouncy and came inflated. Key if you have a kid who can't wait 2 seconds. To be honest 24 hrs before this ball arriving we were just shooting hoops with a soccer ball and she was doing okay, maybe 1 in 10. First time with this ball she got 4 in a row. Maybe just luck but who cares, she was ecstatic!
customer_reviews.author: HappyCat

customer_reviews.title: We own 4 of these basketballs, love them all, will keep buying them
customer_reviews.text: We bought our first Killer Crossover ball two years ago, and it's looking rough but was actually kept outside for two winters in the Northeast US. So we are happy with the durability and now each of my kids has their own basketball. We have some in both the women's (28.5) and youth (27.5) sizes. When replacing the ball that was left outside for two years, my kid asked for the exact same basketball in the exact same colors. She uses a basketball almost every day, so she must be happy with the performance.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Ellen Crandell

customer_reviews.title: Leaking Air
customer_reviews.text: From day one this basketball hasn’t held air. Every time my son wants to play I have to stop what I’m doing and break out the pump! I wanted to return but my son loves green and wouldn’t let the ball out of his site :-(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Return time!
customer_reviews.text: Bought 3 of these balls for our grandsons. This one was bought on April 15 2019. Yesterday the grandsons came over. Showed them the new hoop I put in for them and then gave them the balls. This ball which has never been used before and it needed a little air. Very hard to get the needle in. Made sure it was not the needle. The needle worked on the other 2 balls. After I finally got the needle in and aired it up. The ball would not hold air. This morning I get on Amazon to return the ball. The return date ended 2 days ago. Not really upset about the ball. More upset about the return time! Terrible
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Good size for kids and Dad who want kids to play outside
customer_reviews.text: Bought this ball for my young kids who are just learning. The normal size basketball was just to large to handle. Made the game more enjoyable for the kids and easier for them to throw around. Good quality, been using or 6 months now and no problems. Ball is solidly built and would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Jaga D

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price, love the color options
customer_reviews.text: We bought this ball for my 4 year old as he wanted to have a colored ball instead of the normal basketball you would find at a sporting store. My husband and I were very pleasantly surprised at the quality of the ball once it got here. My son loves his first basketball and it was much more cost affective than if I would have bought it from a sporting good store. This was also one of the few products we were able to find that was the size his team was asking for. Most places we checked didn’t have the size of ball we needed. This product is a win for our family!
customer_reviews.author: BoyMom💙

customer_reviews.title: Great Basketball for all around sports, but even better to celebrate the Final Four!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic basketball. So many uses: 1. We used them to decorate for our Final Four Parties and themed events and then gave them away to the winner of our "Pool" 2. We raffled one off at our school bingo night 3. My kids played basketball with them. 4. One was a present for my nephew. Packaged FANTASTIC. Quick Ship and Just as expected. It's Basketball Y'all!
customer_reviews.author: Whitneydh

customer_reviews.title: awesome basketball.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size ball for an 8 year old. We have been using it at school and every night for the past week at home. You can't tell it is smaller but it is just a hair bit lighter so my daughter can throw it higher to hit the standard height hoop. She loves this ball! It bounces great and feels good. Definitely would buy again! Plus, since it is a different color she can pick her ball out at recess no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Cat339

customer_reviews.title: Deflated
customer_reviews.text: The basketball arrived deflated and we had to order a pump so my 7 year old could play with it. After paying for the pumpand waiting for shipping we realized the valve doesn't hold air for longer than a day. Now they want me to go through the trouble of driving to the nearest UPS drop off to get rid of the thing. Whatever, I'll keep it and eat all the money I've already spent and not spend another dime on gas for this crappy basketball. You get what you pay for I guess..
customer_reviews.author: Mars13

customer_reviews.title: Loses Air Every Single Day
customer_reviews.text: Do you want to have to re-inflate your basket ball every time you use it, because that's what you'll have to do. You have to pump this thing back up every single time you use it. Even from morning to evening there will be a noticeable loss of air. I have purchased 3 Spalding balls and all of them put this ball to shame. My kids all think Wilson sucks because of this terrible ball. I agree and will avoid Wilson products in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron S.

customer_reviews.title: Camp Giveaway Issue
customer_reviews.text: I don't know whether the 3 stars is a good representation of what I think of the ball. I actually like the ball and would give it 5 stars, but I had read other reviews stating that the ball would not hold air when it was received. Unfortunately for me, I ordered them as giveaways for a camp and I had that same problem with a few of the balls. The majority were fine & I loved them, but the few that wouldn't hold air caused some kids to not get a ball.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Buy this instead of a dedicated "Pool Basketball"
customer_reviews.text: This is great for your Pool hoop (or even as a floating toy). Last summer we went through two different Pool basketballs that were twice the price and each one faded and worn out in less than a month. Then I thought of getting one of these "cheap" Wilson basketballs and worked out greater than expected. More than 3 months now floating in our pool and color hasn't faded one bit, it hasn't deflated and there's no tree in our backyard that would puncture this ball. The material is way more durable than those pool basketballs that cost two or three times more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good ball for outside play.
customer_reviews.text: Great ball! I’ve been playing with this ball (same brand not same ball) since high school and it’s still my favorite ball for outside use. However, this one I just bought actually popped the very first day that I played with it on a fence with a couple wires hanging out so I didn’t get much use out of it. (Not the ball’s fault).
customer_reviews.author: Shai

customer_reviews.title: Not Full of Hot Air
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking ball for outdoor use. But... it won't hold any air. Within 5 minutes it loses air and cannot be dribbled. I attempted to file a limited warranty claim at wilson.com, but I was unable to find an actual link for to start the claim process. This will be filed under "Unfortunate Purchases." Best to find a different ball and brand.
customer_reviews.author: Pete Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great ball; distinctive look
customer_reviews.text: Wilson's NCAA balls are great - this is our second. "Cool!" My 5-1/2 year old likes the colors - easy to keep his ball separate from other kids. Gets comments from other kids, too. I can see that everyone might not like the colors/design, and the white does get dirty quickly, but small he loves it, which is what really counts. Great price, too!
customer_reviews.author: Greg S.

customer_reviews.title: Decent ball for good price
customer_reviews.text: Got this for the neighborhood hoop, for the kids to use. Since the last one got popped by a car and it is always vulnerable to being stolen, I did not want it to be a big investment. This is a somewhat cheapish ball but better than I expected. Nice weight and feel. Holds air. Very good ball considering it cost half or less than most others.
customer_reviews.author: a reader

customer_reviews.title: Great durable ball for outside
customer_reviews.text: This isn’t like the cheap rubber balls I grew up with. This feels thick and will withstand some punishment. The non traditional channel was a little bit of a surprise so that is the only reason I didn’t give it a 5 star review. I prefer a standard size ball to have standard designed channels for my child learning to play.
customer_reviews.author: Snommer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic BEYOND My Expectations
customer_reviews.text: Leave it up to Amazon Prime to save the day. This year my daughter politely asked for a blue and silver, regulation size, indoor girl’s basketball for her birthday. Not the yearly, “how about a computer, specific kind of doll, tablet or gaming system” . . . a basketball. I clicked on my Amazon Prime app, in the search bar entered her specific request and voila the ball . . . AND the price beat all the other stores I searched. Best birthday gift yet! She is thrilled. Thank you Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: Problem from the Beginning
customer_reviews.text: The ball arrived low on air. When I tried to air up the ball, it had a noticeable leak. My little grandson was quite disappointed. Unfortunately, I had thrown the box not anticipating a problem. Too expensive to return even if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Guidry

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money but you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: This basketball was pretty cheap--like 10 bucks--I bought 2 and my daughter uses them all the time. Unfortunately one of them needs to be pumped up almost every day because its always losing air, and it has been that way since we got it. The other one holds air better but still needs to be repumped a lot more frequently than you would think. If we were richer I probably would've gotten a better ball, but for what we could spend I guess its OK
customer_reviews.author: locomotivbreth

customer_reviews.title: Good ball to play but doesn’t hold Air day after day.
customer_reviews.text: Basketball is great when playing. But seems every time u pick it up to play it needs air. (As in add more air and then next day it need more air.)
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Will not inflate
customer_reviews.text: Previously purchased a light blue intermediate size that worked great and stays inflate. Returned to purchase a red/white regular size based on that purchase-this ball will not inflate. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Paid too much, it was advertised under $10 and ...
customer_reviews.text: Paid too much, it was advertised under $10 and rang up at $20.99. I tried to cancel within an hour and was not able to, now it will cost me $8 in return shipping even though I’m a prime member and didn’t pay shipping. I’m stuck with it since it is a gift but feel that I was fooled into the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Decent feel, right size, but the surface wears out really fast if used outdoors on a concrete driveway. It says it is for outdoor use, just figure if used outdoor daily it's probably only good for a few months. For under $10 I bought a second one after the first wore out. But it looks and feels old after about a week.
customer_reviews.author: HMC

customer_reviews.title: Will Return ASAP. After one day - lost significant air-pressure.
customer_reviews.text: Will Return ASAP. After one day - lost significant air-pressure.
customer_reviews.author: Mukesh Nyati

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Basketball
customer_reviews.text: This is a great basketball. Especially for the price. My husband coaches our daughters basketball team and gets six of these for practicing each season (during the off season they get left outside by the kids and unusable and ruined by the weather. Totally our fault, not the balls). We’ve never had a problem with them deflating or any other such problems. Totally recommend getting this ball.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Loses air!
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the price of this ball and I like that it looks more colorful than the standard basketball (makes it easy for my daughter to spot her ball at practice), but this ball loses air all the time!! We have only had this ball for a little over a month and I have pumped it up many times!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Hard to find size in stores, high quality, fast delivery, will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: John K

customer_reviews.title: IT IS A BALL
customer_reviews.text: What can one say about a ball. It does what it is meant to.
customer_reviews.author: BR Maxedon

customer_reviews.title: Bummer
customer_reviews.text: It was not in a box that covered the ball. So when I got it it looked like it had been played with. It's all dirty. I still like it but wish it wasn't exposed to getting all dirty in shipment.
customer_reviews.author: Leticia

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: Really good quality basketball. Playing almost everyday. It has more bounce compared to other regular basketball and therefore a bit difficult to put in hoop. A bit on the heavier side too
customer_reviews.author: a3d

customer_reviews.title: Annoying bounce sound is deal breaker.
customer_reviews.text: Meh. Bought this and a Spalding Street ball. This ball has less grip. Worse yet it makes a weird noise like a cheap kickball when you bounce it. Looks nice but will not buy again. Would pay $5 for this but not $10 again.
customer_reviews.author: Enarvee Storm

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: When it comes to playing on an asphalt hoop in a hammerhead -- true community goal -- this ball has been perfect. The color difference in the panels is ideal for talking with a young one about rotation. It is has been most durable.
customer_reviews.author: Hal Mcbride

customer_reviews.title: An annual ball, but so cheap!
customer_reviews.text: I think we have to buy a new ball every year, because by the end of the year, the nubs are all worn off and the ball is getting really smooth. Last year's ball was the same and started cracking this year. Still, at this price I can't complain. When fresh, the ball feels really good.
customer_reviews.author: GreenBanana

customer_reviews.title: Deflates quickly
customer_reviews.text: It was a great street basketball for my 5 year old as far as the size and rubber material goes, but after a few weeks of use, the ball deflated and needs to be inflated periodically.
customer_reviews.author: Vlad

customer_reviews.title: Very glad I purchased
customer_reviews.text: This is the real deal. Came inflated which was a major bonus!! Tons of grip and definitely made for indoor and outdoor use as advertised! All colors of the ball are exactly how it appears in ad.
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: Good ball. Doesn’t hold air well.
customer_reviews.text: For $10 it not bad. It’s a basketball. It does not hold air well though. Not sure if I got a bad one but you pump it up and the next day it’s already considerably softened. And we keep it inside. Other than having to pump it up every time we use it, it’s a good ball.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Came flat with no way to pump it up
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. But my kid cannot use it. I am going to have to go through the hassle of returning it. It is flat. And I have no way to pump it up unless I go get a needle, which means I pay extra. Might as well put that money towards one I can buy in the store and know it is actually full and able to use. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Armendariz

customer_reviews.title: Good value ball
customer_reviews.text: Bought for 7 year old son who started to play on a team this year. Coaches son has same ball. We use inside and outside and it’s been fine. Stays pumped up. Good grip and size
customer_reviews.author: Cooper's mom

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't hold air
customer_reviews.text: It gets annoying having to get out the pump every time I use this. Giving it to Good Will and getting one that doesn't suck. I should have returned it, but missed the window for that.
customer_reviews.author: Don M.

customer_reviews.title: It hold pressure well for me.
customer_reviews.text: Sorry ri bear that so many people had inflation problems with this bank but,,, it's all good here. Seems very durable and holds pressure well. Grandson WON'T put it down. Grandson lives it.
customer_reviews.author: Ross I.

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: Just got this when it's on sale. As a outdoor basketball, it is very easy to hold that the line is deep and the skin is rough. However, this material is very bad for people sweat a lot to hold it. Anyway, outdoor ball always retire fast and it is good price to continue changing your old one all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Wasabi~~

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for, for my six-year-old son who is now playing basketball. This is the same size ball that they use and it does wonders with practicing at home. It’s small enough to where I am OK with him practicing his dribble in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie B

customer_reviews.title: Pleased :)
customer_reviews.text: love it. daughter plays basketball and fav color is blue. she is going to love it :) came a litttle flat , it can still bounce. but will need to air it up some! which is totally ok
customer_reviews.author: summerose

customer_reviews.title: Warped ball
customer_reviews.text: Ball comes warped and does not hold air. I wish I would have listened to the other reviews. Waste of time and money. Now have to box back up and take time to send back when my child needed this size ball for this weekend. Listen to the reviewers.
customer_reviews.author: Amy S.

customer_reviews.title: Durable Ball
customer_reviews.text: This ball has great grip for outdoor play, a good weight, excellent color choices, and it is a durable ball that my child goes to all the time. It is more of a rubbery feel than any sythentic outdoor basketball, but it holds up great with damp conditions and has proven itself to be durable.
customer_reviews.author: TBM

customer_reviews.title: solid
customer_reviews.text: I don't have a lot of experience with basketballs, but this ball has been a solid ball for my 5 year old son's outdoor practice. I was just out to find a good basic outdoor basketball, as I figure a 5 year old will not notice the slight nuances from one ball to the next. At this level, it's not rocket science. This ball has served us well, as a good solid ball for our outdoor practice needs
customer_reviews.author: MBDogs

customer_reviews.title: Fair price, good ball.
customer_reviews.text: Daughter uses the ball twice a week for about 2 hours. So far it's doing great. Great feel to the ball.. gave it 4 stars because I can see the grip is starting to decrease pretty rapidly, but still a good ball for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids
customer_reviews.text: It was a little flat when it arrived, but anyone who is buying a basketball should have a pump on hand, too. Pumped it up to proper air pressure and the kids of been playing all day. It's the perfect size for my 7 and 9 year olds.
customer_reviews.author: N. Cawthray

customer_reviews.title: Arrived deflated
customer_reviews.text: I’m disappointed because it arrived flat. Luckily I had a pump and blew it up but now a week later it’s flat again, which means it must have a hole in it or a slow leak.
customer_reviews.author: R. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Delivered inflated!
customer_reviews.text: It bounces... And, I rarely missed a shot with this ball:) It comes inflated as well which is a bonus and wish I knew ahead of time since I ordered a pump as well.
customer_reviews.author: Retro

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality and workmanship
customer_reviews.text: amazing workmanship and quality at a great price and compared to similar products on the market this item exceeds and stands out all on its own ....
customer_reviews.author: Kirk Fernandes

customer_reviews.title: Good balls
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a basketball team I ended up coaching. They are great balls, I plan on letting the kids take one home at the end of the season!
customer_reviews.author: MnmSweetPy

customer_reviews.title: Good youth basketball
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice youth basketball. It is perfect for my 9yr old. So far there aren't any leaks and is holding up. He likes the green and the fact that it fits his hands better than an adult size one has helped improve his shooting.
customer_reviews.author: Beeswax

customer_reviews.title: They are inexpensive, but don't last very long
customer_reviews.text: These balls don't last very long, but they are a good price. I recommend storing them inside and not using them in inclement weather or near bushes.
customer_reviews.author: OutdoorMama

customer_reviews.title: It arrives flat
customer_reviews.text: It’s a solid ball but it comes to you flat. For the same price, you can go to Target and get one fully inflated without the hassle on getting the tools to below this up.
customer_reviews.author: Deana Seyvertsen

customer_reviews.title: good size for 10 y.o. good initial quality
customer_reviews.text: like all for 10 y.o. should be good, for 1 year max - that backet ball is good for 2 month of every day outside playing. after that, rubber is used to the bold, paint is gone. the ball holding pressure good! i am still recommending it. good purchase!
customer_reviews.author: semolot

customer_reviews.title: Some cosmetic issues but works well
customer_reviews.text: Our 4-year-old daughter enjoys dribbling this ball. It’s a good size for a pre-schooler. My only complaints are that the orange color isn’t applied well and bleeds over the edges. Just cosmetic but the ball works fine. And, the ball arrived really dirty on parts of it. It looked used. I had to scrub for a while to get it clean.
customer_reviews.author: JFC

customer_reviews.title: Stands up to punishment
customer_reviews.text: Given as gift, it has survived this long ( Christmas present) and given to a young fellow who endeavors to get as much use out of everything that he can ( in the shortest amount of time).
customer_reviews.author: Ruth

customer_reviews.title: Good basketball for 5-8 year olds
customer_reviews.text: These are nice Wilson synthetic basketballs good for average sized 5-8 year olds!! They look great, have vibrant colors and are easy to wash and maintain.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Eye catching
customer_reviews.text: I actually purchased this to put in a raffle basket. I'm giving it 5 stars because enough people were familiar with the ball to help raffle sales.
customer_reviews.author: Orland Fan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect price
customer_reviews.text: We needed a youth sized basketball and this has been perfect. I also like that it's green and white so it's not easily mixed up with the rest of the team's basketballs.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 2nd grader who was looking for a 27 inch basketball, indoor and outdoor. He loves green so this was perfect in color and size. I have small hands and find this easier to play with compared to a regular size basketball. His review: Bounces well, easy to grip, helps him take perfect shots. He prefers this to leather.
customer_reviews.author: Vera

customer_reviews.title: Deflated
customer_reviews.text: We could not keep this ball inflated more than one day. We exchanged it for another, though bigger size, so overall a waste of time + money.
customer_reviews.author: Pete Fuller

customer_reviews.title: Quickly deflates
customer_reviews.text: The ball needs to be inflated every time I use it. The material is cheaper than expected. I had it a short while using it with my toddlers and I'm already shopping for a new ball.
customer_reviews.author: Peanut

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't hold air.
customer_reviews.text: It came deflated, aired it up, played and few hours later after dinner it's flat. I've aired it up and submerged it in water and can't see any leak but 2 hours later it's flat again.
customer_reviews.author: L Larsen

customer_reviews.title: Not as durable
customer_reviews.text: Initially, my daughter and I loved this basketball. However, after a while we noticed that it would not hold air for more than a few hours. We shouldn’t have to pump air in the ball everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than I expected but still ok
customer_reviews.text: This ball is much bigger than I thought considering I bought the kids size. My 4 year old can still throw it without a problem though. Price was right.
customer_reviews.author: DDF

customer_reviews.title: OK practice ball
customer_reviews.text: I purchased all three sizes 27.5, 28.5, and 29.5. I coached 4 different age groups in youth basketball. Unlike some leather balls where the "ridge" protruding next to the black "rib" line that are to high, which caused the ball to bounce worp. This ball ridge line is smooth. The only problem is that these basketballs have a tendency to under-flat.
customer_reviews.author: John316

customer_reviews.title: Ball needs more inflation, you can’t play basketball with it!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this as a gift for my daughter, she likes basketball, price was fine but I have noticed that the ball is not inflated properly, it is pretty soft, not bouncing good. I don’t know how to work inflate it..
customer_reviews.author: A. Edeer

customer_reviews.title: Won’t hold air!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t bother. Ball won’t hold air. Spend a few dollars more and get something decent.
customer_reviews.author: Electro Guru

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son at Christmas. He’s an avid basketball player. After only 4 weeks of use, the basketball developed some weird bubble which caused the ball to be lopsided and unusable. He was disappointed. Won’t buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun times with the kids.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one for my six year old so that he could reach the basket. It's fun playing with it. It has excellent grip.
customer_reviews.author: Luis D. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Product Review
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grand-child. She is very happy with it, loved the color, size, material etc. I recommend this ball.
customer_reviews.author: lui

customer_reviews.title: Nice ball.
customer_reviews.text: I like this basketball. The only thing it has no air pump pin to add air to it. So if it Gets flat I guess it's not good anymore. But otherwise good for the money.
customer_reviews.author: J. Dukulis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 11 year old. Used outdoors for a while now and maintained plenty of grip still.
customer_reviews.author: jam

customer_reviews.title: Great ball, paint fades and comes off pretty quick
customer_reviews.text: Great ball, paint fades and comes off pretty quick, but for the price not a big deal does what it is intended to do, bounce and make baskets.
customer_reviews.author: StevieDi

customer_reviews.title: A little dissappointed.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice ball. Love the color. Kids love it. Kind of depressed though. My crossover is still not killer. Actually it's quite horrible. Possibly fake advertising.
customer_reviews.author: Chaser841

customer_reviews.title: It Is What It Is
customer_reviews.text: Only had it for a week, but typical outside rubber ball. Held up good for a few days. No complaints
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Great colors. Durable for outdoor use. Has held us well to abuse from teenagers. Price point can’t be beat
customer_reviews.author: andrew pofahl

customer_reviews.title: Solid $10 basketball for kids
customer_reviews.text: I waited until it went on sale and scooped it up. Probably still a good deal at $20, but @ $10 it's a steal.
customer_reviews.author: Hosa

customer_reviews.title: Playtime ahead
customer_reviews.text: This was on a wishlist for a youngster . It came very promptly after my order and looked to me to be very well constructed and durable. It was a good value too.
customer_reviews.author: CBS

customer_reviews.title: My grandson loved it
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my grandson. He wanted a basketball and his favorite color is green, so it was perfect
customer_reviews.author: Denise Appleby

customer_reviews.title: Under inflated
customer_reviews.text: It arrived very under inflated and won’t hold air. We dont have a bike pump- so we have never really gotten it fully inflated or able to bounce on a court
customer_reviews.author: Paige Stone

customer_reviews.title: Great price on a good practice ball for the boys!
customer_reviews.text: Decided to buy 9 of these (instead of trophies) for our 10-11 year old boys basketball team this year; had the players sign each ball along with the coaches. Boys loved it.
customer_reviews.author: A5

customer_reviews.title: Nice durable outdoor ball
customer_reviews.text: Good outdoor ball. Needed a little air upon receiving but has held air nicely since. We've had for a few months now.
customer_reviews.author: Professor X

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money!
customer_reviews.text: It's great for the price. Color is neutral for our part of the country and my daughter likes it. Plus the bounce is pretty consistent and so far we didn't have any issues with it deflating.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher T. Cheung

customer_reviews.title: Poor quailty control
customer_reviews.text: I recieved the ball with a defective air valve. Poor quality from a big name, disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: SYLVESTER

customer_reviews.title: Cool color but...
customer_reviews.text: Ball has good grip but it came deflated and is lopsided when inflated. When I pumped it to the right weight for my son, however, you can squeeze in the sides of the ball. Just not completely satisfied as a lifetime player but for the price I’ll keep it.
customer_reviews.author: NH

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper at Walmart...
customer_reviews.text: Product is fine... Price is not... Check Walmart out first.... 12.99 here under 10 there...
customer_reviews.author: max

product_meta.title: Wilson Killer Crossover Basketball
product_meta.description: Like a good crossover, the Killer Crossover ball helps you change pace and direction, or location. The all surface cover works indoor or outdoor and provides optimal grip in all game conditions. You can make it rain, rain or shine.
feature_bullets: All Surface Cover and Deep Channel Construction improves grip
Premium Carcass Construction for excellent rebound and durability
Optima rubber cover with 16 panel construction

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
